name: HSP_BFH_ACT_DATA_BDC
description: This table stores billing activity history action-specific data. Every time a billing activity (ATM) is performed on a record or group of records, an activity history record (BFH) is logged. These activity history records store specific data related to each action that was performed on the activity. Each action (and its related data) is logged as a line in related group BFH 300. This table is specifically for actions performed on insurance follow-up (BDC) records.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The action category ID for this row in the billing activity history. The other data in this row represent specific values associated with this action performed.
entries: Change Next Payment Plan Auto Pay Date
Send In Basket Message for DBC
Change Next Visit Auto Pay Date
Override Send DBC to Grouper Checks
Mark for Separate Service Area Billing
Unmark for Separate Service Area Billing
Process Visit Auto Pay Payment Now
Send Self-Pay to Consolidated Service Area / External Billing
Return from Consolidated Service Area / External Billing
Initiate Home Health Notice of Admission

columns.name: ACT_BDC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record status category ID that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RESOLVE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record resolution reason category ID that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_OWNING_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record owning area category ID that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_DENIAL_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the category ID of the denial record denial category that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROOT_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record root cause category ID that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RPT_REMIT_CODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record reporting remittance code ID that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RPT_REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_SOURCE_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence source area category ID that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_PREVENTABLE_YN
columns.description: This column stores the denial record preventable status that is set as a result of this action. 'Y' indicates that the denial was preventable. 'N' or NULL indicate that it was not preventable.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the denial appeal stage (I BDC 10130).

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_DUE_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the denial appeal due date (I BDC 10022).

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_USER_ID

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_SUBMIT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the denial appeal submission date (I BDC 10023).

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_SUBMIT_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the denial appeal submission method (I BDC 10028).

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RES_OWNER_USER_ID
columns.description: The column represents the resolution owner for the follow-up records.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RES_OWNER_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_SOURCE_USER_ID
columns.description: The column represents the caused by user for the follow-up records.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_SOURCE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_SOURCE_DEPT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the caused-by department for the follow-up records.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_SELECT_LN_YN
columns.description: The column indicates whether denial resubmission had a manually-selected line.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_OVRIDE_DATA_YN
columns.description: The column indicates whether resubmitted lines had override data.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_NEXT_FOLLOWUP_DATE
columns.description: The Next Follow-up Date that was changed as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The appeal level set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROI_RECIPIENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the recipient or organization (AGY record) specified when generating the Release of Information (ROI) documentation created from this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROI_RECIPIENT_ID_AGENCY_NAME

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROI_SUB_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the submission method specified when generating the Release of Information (ROI) documentation created from this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROI_RELEASE_TMPLT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the release template (RTM record) specified when generating the Release of Information (ROI) documentation created from this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROI_RELEASE_TMPLT_ID_ROI_TEMPLT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the release template.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_PAYER_DOWNGRADE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The BDC Payer Downgrade Type that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_PAYER_DOWNGRADE_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: The BDC Payer Downgrade Outcome that is set as a result of this action.
